script.title: ex-params.slax
script.author: phil
script.synopsis: Turns simplified interface configuration into diverse configuration
script.description: We define an apply-macro for simplified interface configurations. These are expanded into a diverse set of configuration statements.
script.implementation: Using configuration groups (such as 'interface-details' and 'cos-details' in this example) with commit scripts can keep the details of any configuration expansions in the configuration database, where they can be more easily changed.
